project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Implement a feature allowing users to send and receive text messages instantly.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in the correct chronological order in the chat window
Users can see when the other party is typing
dependencies: WebSocket or similar real-time communication protocol
non_functional: System must handle at least 10,000 concurrent users
Latency for message delivery must be under 1 second in 95% of cases

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Enable users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and end a video call with another user
Video and audio quality remain stable with less than 300ms latency under normal network conditions
Call connection is established within 3 seconds
dependencies: WebRTC or similar video communication technology
non_functional: Support HD video quality (720p) with adaptive bitrate

notes: Assumed that the application will support one-to-one messaging and video calls initially; group chat and group video calls are not included unless specified.
